Ritualist:PossessionPower.NAME: Possession
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn, lose #b

Ritualist:AttunePower.NAME: Attunement
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases effect of summon cards. They consume all attunement.

DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, when you have no cards in hand, Gain #b

Strength and Dexterity until end of turn.

Ritualist:DemonArmPower.NAME: Demon Arm
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play an attack deal #y

Ritualist:DemonArmUpgPower.NAME: Demon Arm+

Ritualist:GrowingRitesPower.NAME: Growing Rites
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn gain #b

Ritualist:DuskSeekerPower.NAME: Dusk Seeker
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn add #b
card from your draw pile into your hand.

Ritualist:TwinWavePower.NAME: Twin Wave
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn deal #y

Ritualist:SpreadingCursePower.NAME: Spreading Curse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn apply #b

Ritualist:SabbathPower.NAME: Sabbath

Ritualist:DeepReservesPower.NAME: Deep Reserves

Ritualist:SymbioteFormPower.NAME: Symbiote Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Summons refund half Attunement and don't exhaust.
